product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and elegant design intended to promote premium jewelry. The background uses a diagonal split gradient blending soft pink (#F8BBD0, #F48FB1) into rich maroon shades (#7D2E40, #5D2129), giving a soft-to-bold visual transition. Decorative star-shaped elements and soft radial light flares add a touch of shimmer and sophistication. 

The text layer with id **"heading"** displays a bold product category title in an eye-catching, playful font, followed by the **"subheading"** for the product type in an assertive, modern typeface. Supporting information like metal type and warranty is elegantly listed on the **"description"** layer. 

The **"price"** layer prominently showcases the cost in large, bold white text, designed to attract immediate attention. A pink rectangular button (**"cta_background"**) with dark text (**"cta"**) invites the viewer to take action. The **"product_image"** id is used for a realistic image of the jewelry placed centrally for emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: #F8BBD0
- Medium Pink: #F48FB1
- Dark Maroon: #7D2E40
- Deep Burgundy: #5D2129
- Accent Pink (CTA): #FFB6C1
- Text White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a delicate blend of rose gold and crystalline elements. The primary color, rose gold (#F4A6A6), dominates the structure, offering a warm and luxurious appeal. Clear crystal stones, represented by a frosty white (#FFFFFF) and silver glimmer (#D8D8D8), create a striking contrast while enhancing the metal's pinkish tone. The blush pink enamel detail (#FAD2D2) adds a soft charm, harmonizing with the rose gold base. These colors are smoothly blended, with each gemstone outlined in rose tones to unify the palette while also being highlighted individually through sharp reflects and polished finishes.
